Name: Doodle Tanks
About the game: It’s Time to Go to War! From the Creators of Doodle God & Doodle Devil Comes a New All Ages Puzzle Game! Available in 6 Languages Over 160 Million Players For Doodle Series Worldwide! BECOME A TANK & ARMORED VEHICLE DESIGNER! From the creators of the award winning Doodle God & Doodle Devil comes a new ALL ages puzzle game with a fun historical twist. Combine artillery and other elements to create dozens of World War II tanks and armored vehicles. Start with four basic elements and watch your creations come alive as you create historically accurate tanks and armored vehicles that once rolled across Europe and Africa. Along the way, learn about the historic events and designers that shaped the outcome of the free world. It’s time to go to War in Doodle Tanks! NEW GAMEPLAY FEATURES ✔ Dozens of Tank and Armored Vehicles to Engineer and Build ✔ Over 100 reactions to perform and over 200 elements to combine ✔ Learn about the legends of Tank & Armored Vehicle Design ✔ ALL ages puzzle fun with a historical twist
